Description:
Providing customer service: Bus drivers must be friendly and courteous to passengers and answer any questions they may have.
Deliver exceptional customer service by exhibiting friendliness and courtesy to passengers, addressing their inquiries.
Take on the responsibility of inspecting and maintaining buses, ensuring their excellent operational status.
Take on the responsibility of fare collection, ensuring passengers pay the appropriate amount for their journey.Skills
Skills:
Able to manage their time effectively to follow schedules and arrive at stops on time.
Exhibit the ability to swiftly identify and resolve issues with buses or routes through effective troubleshooting.
Require a CDL with appropriate endorsements to meet the qualifications of the position.
Need to hold a commercial driver's license (CDL) with relevant endorsements to perform the duties of a bus driver.
